Package simple.escp.data

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataSource
    A DataSource is used to supply value when filling a Report.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeanDataSource
    A BeanDataSource is a DataSource that obtains its value from a Java Bean object.
    DataSources
    A factory class to create DataSource.
    DataSources.DataSourceEntry
    Internal class used by DataSource.
    EmptyDataSource
    An empty data source that does nothing excepts returning empty string.
    JsonDataSource
    This data source will read data source from JSON.
    MapDataSource
    A MapDataSource is a DataSource that obtains its value from a Map.
